message.content:
On keyboards:

Back in the before-times when we were working out of an office, we issued fairly standard Corsair mechanical keyboards to everyone.

At home, I use a tenkeyless CODE keyboard from wasd. I used to have a Happy Hacking keyboard that I absolutely loved and used until it broke after years and years of use.

My son has just gotten into mechnical keyboards and I was rather impressed with the RK68 keyboard he modded. Turned out better than I expected. He keeps eyeing up a Tofu65 or NK65 kit.
